3 months
--- Yanshosh@... wrote:
> FINALLY! I havn't been able to get online for the past two days (hence not posting). My hard
> drive finally died all the way, and I turned it in and got it replaced. I just now got
> everything installed (takes a while to set up a dual-boot Windows/Linux comp). I have caught up,
> but its 4:11am and I still havn't got to bed, so I'll post tomorrow as soon as I'm concious.
> 
> BTW! The council election has been over for a few days now (if anyone who could still vote tried
> to vote, they should get an error), but the new council is:
> 
> rAuq@...
> Rdahl@...
> BeastWars@...
> 
> And me, but that's normal. Anyways, I havn't changed settings on the site cause my server isn't
> cooperating with me, but I'll do that tomorrow too. Alloran and Megan, its been great having you
> guys on the council. We wouldn't have accomplished as much as we did if you guys hadn't been on
> the team. I hope to see y'all in future councils. Congratulations to everyone else that ran for
> council. It was a really close race.
> 
> But congratulations to the new council members! BeastWars is gone for two weeks, so I guess its
> just me, rAuq, and Rdahl for now. I'll get Rdahl councilized tomorrow (I have a feeling I'll
> regret that).
> 
> 
> Also, the previous council has gone on for three months (partly because of incompetence on my
> part and partly because of the election being so close to August that it was just left up there
> to make things easier). Do you guys (all RPGers) want to extend the terms to three months, or do
> you wanna keep them at two months and make the first council an exception?
> 
> 
> One of my jobs ends next week, and I'll have a bunch of extra time to RP and work on the site.
> I'll get it fully updated and complete the new login system as soon as I can. Should be pretty
> cool.
> 
> 
> G'night everyone.
> 
> 


=====
REPLY SOON          HARLEY PARRY FROM ST.THOMAS
